life.en: You're not lost. You're just avoiding the truth.
life.zh: 你不是迷路，你只是在逃避真相。

life.en: Potential is an achievement you haven't earned yet.
life.zh: 「潛力」是指你還沒拿到手的成就。

life.en: Your comfort zone is where dreams go to die.
life.zh: 舒適圈是夢想火化的地方。

life.en: Every silver lining has a cloud.
life.zh: 每道光芒背後，都有一片烏雲。

life.en: You're unique, just like everyone else.
life.zh: 你是獨一無二的，就像其他所有人一樣。

life.en: Life is what happens while you're waiting for it to begin.
life.zh: 生活就是當你等待它開始時，正在發生的那些事。

life.en: The light at the end of the tunnel might be a train.
life.zh: 隧道盡頭的光，可能是迎面而來的火車。

life.en: Expect nothing and you'll still be disappointed.
life.zh: 即便不期不待，你還是會感到崩潰。

life.en: Stop waiting for a sign, start waiting for the inevitable.
life.zh: 別等天啟了，等那必然發生的悲劇吧。

life.en: Your life isn't a movie. No one is watching.
life.zh: 你的人生不是電影，沒人在看。

life.en: Tomorrow is just today's mistakes, repeated.
life.zh: 明天不過是今天的錯誤循環。

life.en: Some people are only alive because killing is illegal.
life.zh: 有些人活著，純粹是因為殺人違法。

life.en: The best is not yet to come. This is it.
life.zh: 最好的尚未到來？不，這就是全部了。

life.en: You are the common denominator in all your problems.
life.zh: 你所有問題的共同點就是：你自己。

life.en: Don't follow your heart. It's an idiot.
life.zh: 別聽從內心，那是個笨蛋。

life.en: The universe doesn't have a plan for you. Relax.
life.zh: 宇宙對你沒什麼計畫，放輕鬆吧。

life.en: Youth is wasted on the young.
life.zh: 青春總是浪費在年輕人身上。

life.en: Your secrets are only safe with people who don't care.
life.zh: 你的秘密只有在不在乎你的人面前才是安全的。

life.en: Nostalgia is a file that removes the rough edges from the past.
life.zh: 懷舊就像一個濾鏡，磨掉了過去所有的不堪。

life.en: Wisdom comes with age, but sometimes age comes alone.
life.zh: 智慧隨年齡增長，但有時增長的只有年齡。

life.en: Everything happens for a reason. Sometimes the reason is you're stupid.
life.zh: 凡事皆有因，有時候原因是出在你太蠢。

life.en: Life is a tragedy for those who feel, and a comedy for those who think.
life.zh: 對感性的人來說，生活是悲劇；對理性的人來說，是喜劇。

life.en: If at first you don't succeed, skydiving is not for you.
life.zh: 如果第一次沒成功，那跳傘這項運動顯然不適合你。

life.en: The road to success is always under construction.
life.zh: 通往成功的道路永遠在施工中。

life.en: Hard work never killed anyone, but why take the chance?
life.zh: 努力工作沒死過人，但何必冒這個險？

life.en: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
life.zh: 經驗，是每個人給自己的錯誤起的優雅名字。

life.en: You are not your job. You are your credit score.
life.zh: 你不是你的工作，你是你的信用分數。

life.en: A clear conscience is usually the sign of a bad memory.
life.zh: 問心無愧通常是因為記憶力不好。

life.en: Reality is a crutch for people who can't handle drugs.
life.zh: 現實，是給那些無法駕馭幻想的人準備的拐杖。

life.en: The grass is greener on the other side because it's fertilized with BS.
life.zh: 另一邊的草比較綠，是因為那裡充滿了廢話肥料。

life.en: If you want to make God laugh, tell him your plans.
life.zh: 如果你想讓上帝發笑，告訴祂你的計畫。

life.en: Life is short, and so is your attention span.
life.zh: 人生苦短，你的專注力也是。

life.en: You can be anything you want, except competent.
life.zh: 你可以成為任何你想成為的人，除了「稱職的人」。

life.en: Common sense is not so common.
life.zh: 常識其實一點也不尋常。

life.en: To err is human, to blame it on someone else is even more human.
life.zh: 犯錯是人性，把錯推給別人更是人性。

life.en: Don't pray for a lighter load, pray for a stronger back.
life.zh: 與其祈求擔子減輕，不如祈求背脊強壯。

life.en: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
life.zh: 沒有計畫的目標，純粹是白日夢。

life.en: Your opinion matters, but not to the laws of physics.
life.zh: 你的意見很重要，但對物理定律來說並非如此。

life.en: The only thing constant is change, and your lack of it.
life.zh: 唯一不變的是變化，還有你的一成不變。

life.en: You're just a background character in someone else's story.
life.zh: 你只是別人的故事裡的背景路人。

work.en: The company will replace you before your funeral.
work.zh: 公司會在你的葬禮前就把職位補滿。

work.en: Hard work pays off in the future. Laziness pays off now.
work.zh: 努力在未來見效，偷懶現在就能爽到。

work.en: Your boss isn't busy. You're just not a priority.
work.zh: 老闆不忙，他只是沒把你放在眼裡。

work.en: The reward for good work is more work.
work.zh: 工作出色的獎勵，就是更多的工作。

work.en: Your passion is being sold for someone else's yacht.
work.zh: 你的熱情正在被販賣，換成別人的遊艇。

work.en: Salary is the bribe they give you to forget your dreams.
work.zh: 薪水是他們讓你忘記夢想的賄賂。

work.en: A meeting is where minutes are kept and hours are lost.
work.zh: 會議：紀錄了幾分鐘，浪費了幾小時。

work.en: Teamwork: sharing the credit and shifting the blame.
work.zh: 團隊合作：分享功勞，推卸責任。

work.en: If you think your boss is stupid, remember: he hired you.
work.zh: 如果你覺得老闆蠢，記住是他雇用了你。

work.en: Your resume is a list of things you never want to do again.
work.zh: 你的簡歷就是一張「你再也不想做的事」清單。

work.en: Work is for people who haven't found a better way to get money.
work.zh: 工作是給還沒找到更好賺錢方法的人做的。

work.en: Burnout isn't a badge of honor. It's a sign of poor boundaries.
work.zh: 過勞不是榮譽勳章，是底線失守的警訊。

work.en: The office is a family, and just like real families, it's toxic.
work.zh: 辦公室是個大家庭，就像現實家庭一樣，充滿毒性。

work.en: Success is 1% inspiration and 99% luck you don't have.
work.zh: 成功是 1% 靈感加上 99% 你沒有的運氣。

work.en: The best way to get a promotion is to leave.
work.zh: 升職加薪最快的方法就是離職。

work.en: You're essential until you're expensive.
work.zh: 在變貴之前，你都是不可或缺的。

work.en: Your HR department is there to protect the company, not you.
work.zh: 人資部門是來保護公司的，不是來保護你的。

work.en: A vacation is just working from a different location with worse Wi-Fi.
work.zh: 渡假只是換個 Wi-Fi 更爛的地方繼續工作。

work.en: The hardest part of your job is pretending to care.
work.zh: 工作最難的部分在於假裝你在乎。

work.en: Your productivity is just a metric for someone's bonus.
work.zh: 你的生產力，只是別人的獎金指標。

work.en: Professionalism is the art of hiding how much you hate your colleagues.
work.zh: 專業，就是隱藏你有多討厭同事的藝術。

work.en: Corporate culture is just peer pressure for adults.
work.zh: 企業文化，就是給成年人施加的同儕壓力。

work.en: The light at the end of the tunnel is just more work.
work.zh: 隧道盡頭的光，只是更多的工作。

work.en: A 'fast-paced environment' means they are understaffed.
work.zh: 所謂「步調極快的工作環境」就是指人力不足。

work.en: Your title is just a way to make you feel important while you're underpaid.
work.zh: 頭銜只是讓你在低薪時感覺自己很重要的手段。

work.en: If you're irreplaceable, you're unpromotable.
work.zh: 如果你不可取代，那你也無法升職。

work.en: The more you do, the more is expected of you for the same pay.
work.zh: 你做得越多，同樣的薪水下，別人對你的要求就越高。

work.en: Work-life balance is a myth created by people with assistants.
work.zh: 工作生活平衡，是那些有助理的人編出來的鬼話。

work.en: You are just a line on a spreadsheet.
work.zh: 你只是試算表裡的一列數據。

work.en: The office coffee is the only thing keeping the economy from collapsing.
work.zh: 辦公室咖啡是唯一防止經濟崩潰的東西。

work.en: Networking is just making friends for people you don't like.
work.zh: 人脈經營，就是為了你不喜歡的人而去交朋友。

work.en: Your computer is faster than your career growth.
work.zh: 電腦的運行速度比你的職業成長還快。

work.en: Innovation is just an old idea with a new marketing budget.
work.zh: 創新，只是換了行銷預算的舊點子。

work.en: Being early to a meeting just means you're wasting more time.
work.zh: 早到開會現場，只代表你浪費了更多時間。

work.en: Your salary is a subscription to your time.
work.zh: 薪水就是你時間的訂閱費。

work.en: A promotion is just a bigger cage.
work.zh: 升職只是一個更大的籠子。

work.en: The company values are just posters on the wall.
work.zh: 公司價值觀只是牆上的海報。

work.en: Email: the art of making someone else's problem yours.
work.zh: 電子郵件：把別人的問題變成你的問題的藝術。

work.en: Retirement is the carrot; death is the stick.
work.zh: 退休是胡蘿蔔，死亡是那根棍子。

work.en: Coffee: because adulting is hard.
work.zh: 喝咖啡吧，因為當成年人真的很累。

love.en: They didn't ghost you. They just chose someone else.
love.zh: 他們不是人間蒸發，只是選擇了別人。

love.en: Love is blind, but marriage is an eye-opener.
love.zh: 愛情是盲目的，但婚姻會讓你睜開狗眼。

love.en: Red flags look like roses through rose-colored glasses.
love.zh: 戴著濾鏡看人時，滿地紅燈都像玫瑰。

love.en: Soulmates are just people you haven't gotten tired of yet.
love.zh: 靈魂伴侶只是那些你還沒看膩的人。

love.en: Marriage is the leading cause of divorce.
love.zh: 婚姻是導致離婚的首要原因。

love.en: They miss you? No, they miss the ego boost you gave them.
love.zh: 想你？不，他們只是想念你帶給他們的優越感。

love.en: Attachment is not love. Loneliness is not a reason.
love.zh: 依賴不是愛，寂寞也不是理由。

love.en: The person you'd die for is usually the one killing you.
love.zh: 你願意為之而死的人，往往就是正在殺死你的人。

love.en: Love is temporary insanity curable by time.
love.zh: 愛情是短暫的瘋狂，時間是唯一的解藥。

love.en: Your ex is an ex for a reason.
love.zh: 前任之所以是前任，是有原因的。

love.en: Stop searching for 'The One' and start working on yourself.
love.zh: 別找「真命天子」了，先救救你自己吧。

love.en: Distance doesn't make the heart grow fonder, it makes it wander.
love.zh: 距離產生的不是美感，是移情別戀。

love.en: Happily ever after is for fairy tales and bank accounts.
love.zh: 「幸福快樂」只存在於童話和銀行戶頭裡。

love.en: You aren't hard to love. You're just choosing the wrong people.
love.zh: 你沒那麼難愛，你只是專挑爛人。

love.en: Chemistry is just nature's way of tricking you into reproduction.
love.zh: 化學反應是大自然騙你繁衍後代的手段。

love.en: True love is finding someone whose BS matches yours.
love.zh: 真愛，就是找到一個廢話頻率跟你很合的人。

love.en: If you love someone, let them go. If they come back, nobody else wanted them.
love.zh: 愛他就放他走。如果他回來了，說明沒別人要他。

love.en: Love is the answer, but while you're waiting, sex raises some fun questions.
love.zh: 愛是答案，但在等待的過程中，性會提出更有趣的問題。

love.en: Heartbreak is a great way to lose weight.
love.zh: 心碎是減肥的好方法。

love.en: You can't fix them. You're not a mechanic.
love.zh: 你救不了他，你又不是維修工。

love.en: Romance is just a fancy word for hormones.
love.zh: 浪漫只是荷爾蒙的高級說法。

love.en: Your wedding is just a party for people you barely know.
love.zh: 你的婚禮只是為了那些你根本不熟的人辦的派對。

love.en: Arguments are just two people trying to be right at the same time.
love.zh: 爭吵只是兩個人都在試圖同時證明自己是對的。

love.en: Jealousy is just insecurity with a better publicist.
love.zh: 嫉妒，只是包裝得比較好的不安全感。

love.en: Dating is just interviews for a job you'll eventually hate.
love.zh: 約會，只是在為一份你終將討厭的工作面試。

love.en: The honeymoon phase is a lie.
love.zh: 蜜月期就是一場騙局。

love.en: Closure is a myth. Move on.
love.zh: 「有始有終」是個神話，直接往前走吧。

love.en: Infatuation is when you haven't found their flaws yet.
love.zh: 迷戀，只是因為你還沒發現他的缺點。

love.en: Love doesn't pay the rent.
love.zh: 愛不能拿來繳房租。

love.en: Shared values are more important than shared hobbies.
love.zh: 價值觀相同比愛好相同更重要。

love.en: A relationship is not a substitute for therapy.
love.zh: 一段感情不能替代心理諮商。

love.en: The bar is on the floor and you're still tripping over it.
love.zh: 標準已經低到地心了，你竟然還能被絆倒。

love.en: Love is a game where both players usually lose.
love.zh: 愛情是一場雙方通常都會輸掉的遊戲。

love.en: You're in love with the idea of them, not the reality.
love.zh: 你愛的是你想像中的他，不是現實的他。

love.en: Loyalty is rare; if you find it, keep it.
love.zh: 忠誠是罕見的，如果你找到了，請珍惜。

love.en: Every couple has a 'crazy' one. If you don't know who it is, it's you.
love.zh: 每對伴侶中都有一個瘋子，如果你不知道是誰，那就是你。

love.en: Falling in love is easy; staying in love is work.
love.zh: 墜入愛河很容易，維持愛則是一項體力活。

love.en: Compatibility is about how you handle conflict.
love.zh: 契合度取決於你們如何處理衝突。

love.en: Your soulmate is probably in another timezone.
love.zh: 你的靈魂伴侶可能在另一個時區。

love.en: Love is giving someone the power to destroy you and trusting them not to.
love.zh: 愛是給予某人摧毀你的權力，並相信他不會這麼做。

money.en: Money can't buy happiness, but it buys better misery.
money.zh: 錢買不到快樂，但能買到更高級的痛苦。

money.en: Your bank account is a scorecard of bad decisions.
money.zh: 銀行餘額是你錯誤決定的計分板。

money.en: Salary is a bribe to forget your dreams.
money.zh: 薪水是讓你忘記夢想的賄賂。

money.en: Budgeting is an organized way of realizing you're broke.
money.zh: 做預算是有組織地意識到自己沒錢。

money.en: Money is the root of all evil, and man needs roots.
money.zh: 錢是萬惡之源，而人類需要根源。

money.en: The best things in life are free; the rest are overpriced.
money.zh: 生命中最美好的免費，其餘的都貴得離譜。

money.en: A fool and his money are soon elected.
money.zh: 傻瓜和他的錢很快就會被選入政府（或被騙光）。

money.en: If you want to know what God thinks of money, look at who He gives it to.
money.zh: 想知道上帝對錢的看法？看看祂都把錢給了誰。

money.en: I'm not broke, I'm just in a pre-rich phase.
money.zh: 我不是窮，我只是處於「暴富前夕」。

money.en: Retail therapy is just delayed regret.
money.zh: 購物療法只是延遲發生的後悔。

money.en: Invest in yourself. It's the only thing you can't lose in a crash.
money.zh: 投資自己吧，這是唯一不會在崩盤中歸零的東西。

money.en: Money doesn't change people. It unmasks them.
money.zh: 金錢不會改變人，它只會讓偽裝卸下。

money.en: Debt is the only thing that grows without water.
money.zh: 債務是唯一不需要澆水就能成長的東西。

money.en: You can't take it with you, but you can leave a mess behind.
money.zh: 錢帶不走，但你可以留下一堆爛帳。

money.en: Savings: a hedge against a future you're not sure you have.
money.zh: 存款：對沖那個你甚至不確定是否擁有的未來。

money.en: A loan is just a way to spend tomorrow's money today.
money.zh: 貸款就是今天花明天的錢的一種方式。

money.en: Taxes are the price we pay for a civilized society that isn't very civilized.
money.zh: 稅收是我們為一個其實沒那麼文明的文明社會付出的代價。

money.en: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life on your terms.
money.zh: 財富，就是按你的意願完全體驗生活的自由。

money.en: Inflation is the invisible thief in your wallet.
money.zh: 通貨膨脹，就是你錢包裡的隱形小偷。

money.en: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries; poor people have the opposite.
money.zh: 富人的電視很小書房很大，窮人則相反。

money.en: Financial freedom is the goal, not a fancy car.
money.zh: 目標是財務自由，而不是一輛華麗的跑車。

money.en: Compounding interest is the eighth wonder of the world.
money.zh: 複利是世界第八大奇蹟。

money.en: Your lifestyle is a trap.
money.zh: 你的生活方式其實是個陷阱。

money.en: Status is what you buy when you don't have substance.
money.zh: 地位，是當你沒有內涵時買來充場面的東西。

money.en: Money is a tool, not a destination.
money.zh: 金錢是工具，不是目的地。

money.en: If you buy things you don't need, soon you will sell things you need.
money.zh: 如果你買不需要的東西，很快你就會被迫賣掉需要的東西。

money.en: Economic crisis is a transfer of wealth.
money.zh: 經濟危機本質上是財富的轉移。

money.en: A paycheck is a drug that makes you forget your potential.
money.zh: 薪水就像毒品，讓你忘記自己的潛力。

money.en: Passive income is the only way to escape the rat race.
money.zh: 被動收入是逃離這場生存競賽的唯一途徑。

money.en: Being poor is expensive.
money.zh: 當個窮人的成本是很高的。

money.en: The stock market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.
money.zh: 股市是將錢從沒耐心的人轉移到有耐心的人手中的工具。

money.en: Generosity is a luxury you can't afford yet.
money.zh: 慷慨是你現在還負擔不起的奢侈品。

money.en: The more you learn, the more you earn.
money.zh: 學得越多，賺得越多。

money.en: Money buys time, and time is the only thing you can't get back.
money.zh: 錢能買到時間，而時間是唯一拿不回來的東西。

money.en: Insurance is a bet that you'll lose.
money.zh: 保險就是一場「賭你會輸」的賭博。

money.en: Your net worth is not your self-worth.
money.zh: 你的身價不代表你的價值。

money.en: The bank is not your friend.
money.zh: 銀行不是你的朋友。

money.en: Greed is good, until it isn't.
money.zh: 貪婪在出事之前都是好事。

money.en: Cash is king, but credit is a cruel master.
money.zh: 現金是王，信用則是殘酷的主人。

money.en: Wealth is what you don't see (the cars not bought, the clothes not worn).
money.zh: 財富是你沒看到的部分（沒買的車、沒穿的名牌）。
